name: King
description: Moves one square in any direction.

name: Queen
description: Moves diagonally, horizontally, or vertically any number of squares.

name: Rook
description: Moves horizontally or vertically any number of squares.

name: Bishop
description: Moves diagonally any number of squares.

name: Knight
description: Moves in an L-shape: two squares in one direction and then one square perpendicular.

name: Pawn
description: Moves forward one square, captures diagonally.
